required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Pilot Study of the Endologix Fenestrated Stent Graft System
clinical_study.official_title: Prospective, Multicenter, Single Arm Feasibility and Initial Safety Study of the Endologix Fenestrated Stent Graft System for the Endovascular Repair of Juxtarenal/Pararenal (JAA/PAA) Aneurysms

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to determine whether the Endologix fenestrated stent graft system is safe and feasible in the endovascular repair of juxtarenal or pararenal aortic aneurysm.

primary_outcome.description: Major Adverse Events = all cause death; bowel ischemia; myocardial infarction; paraplegia; renal failure; respiratory complications of stroke; blood loss >1000cc
Procedural Success with aortic/fenestrated and renal stent graft patency and absence of Type I/III endoleak or migration

secondary_outcome.description: Major Adverse Events = all cause death; bowel ischemia; myocardial infarction; paraplegia; renal failure; respiratory complications of stroke; blood loss >1000cc
All adverse events, whether serious or non-serious
Aortic, fenestrated, and renal stent graft integrity and patency; migration; endoleak; and aneurysm sac morphology

intervention.description: Endovascular repair of juxtarenal or pararenal aortic aneurysm
